languages.text: "Выдвигаю первоочередной запрос на отсрочку экзекуции моего собрата, а также дополнительный запрос на пересмотр приговора. Прежде всего надлежит получить от него информацию".

"Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."
languages.original_text: "Выдвигаю первоочередной запрос на отсрочку экзекуции моего собрата, а также дополнительный запрос на пересмотр приговора. Прежде всего надлежит получить от него информацию".

traits.locale_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「まず私の技術兄弟に対する処刑執行の猶予の要請書、それから評決の再検討を要請する補足の申請書を送る。我々の最初の一歩は彼が持っている情報を引き出すことだ」
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: 「まず私の技術兄弟に対する処刑執行の猶予の要請書、それから評決の再検討を要請する補足の申請書を送る。我々の最初の一歩は彼が持っている情報を引き出すことだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “提交暂缓执行我技术兄弟死刑的优先请求，以及重新考虑判决的补充请求。我们的首先要做的，应该是提取他掌握的信息。”
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: “提交暂缓执行我技术兄弟死刑的优先请求，以及重新考虑判决的补充请求。我们的首先要做的，应该是提取他掌握的信息。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich reiche einen priorisierte Antrag auf Aufschiebung der Hinrichtung meines Tech-Bruders ein, dazu einen ergänzenden Antrag auf Neubewertung des Urteils. Unser erster Schritt sollte sein, sämtliche Informationen zu extrahieren, die er besitzt."
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: "Ich reiche einen priorisierte Antrag auf Aufschiebung der Hinrichtung meines Tech-Bruders ein, dazu einen ergänzenden Antrag auf Neubewertung des Urteils. Unser erster Schritt sollte sein, sämtliche Informationen zu extrahieren, die er besitzt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je soumets une requête prioritaire en vue d'obtenir un sursis à l'exécution de mon technofrère, ainsi qu'une demande additionnelle de révision de la sentence. Nous devrions commencer par recueillir les informations qu'il détient. »
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: « Je soumets une requête prioritaire en vue d'obtenir un sursis à l'exécution de mon technofrère, ainsi qu'une demande additionnelle de révision de la sentence. Nous devrions commencer par recueillir les informations qu'il détient. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Presento formalmente una solicitud prioritaria para que se aplace la ejecución de mi tecnohermano, así como una petición complementaria a fin de que se reconsidere su veredicto. Nuestro primer paso debería ser extraer toda la información que posee».
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: «Presento formalmente una solicitud prioritaria para que se aplace la ejecución de mi tecnohermano, así como una petición complementaria a fin de que se reconsidere su veredicto. Nuestro primer paso debería ser extraer toda la información que posee».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Tekno kardeşimin infazının durdurulmasının yanı sıra kararın gözden geçirilmesi için öncelikli talep bildiriliyor. İlk adımımız, sahip olduğu bilgilerin ayıklanması olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Submitting a priority request for a stay of my tech-brother's execution as well as a supplementary request to have the verdict reconsidered. Our first step should be extracting what information he possesses."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno kardeşimin infazının durdurulmasının yanı sıra, kararın gözden geçirilmesi için öncelikli talep bildiriliyor. İlk adımımız, sahip olduğu bilgilerin ayıklanması olmalı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
